flawed_nl_solution:
The judge dismissed 2 cases, leaving 17 - 2 = <<17-2=15>>15 cases.
Of the remaining 15 cases, 2 / 3 * 15 = <<2/3*15=45/2>>45/2 were ruled innocent.
One ruling was delayed, so the judge ruled guilty on 15 - 45/2 - 1 = <<15-45/2-1=-17/2>>-17/2 cases.
#### -17/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 45/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
